comment: He stressed critical thinking. Classes we fun, yet hard. He made us do a lot of reading and writing. His feedback was excellent.
Students liked and respected him.  He was a hard, but fair teacher. Classes were fun and informative. He stresses critical thinking. He made us do a lot of research and he made us speak in class.
Students liked and respected him.  He was a hard, but fair teacher. Classes were fun and informative. He stresses critical thinking
Dr. Heard was very nice, very helpful with course work. Very willing to answer any questions I had.
great teacher, I loved coming to class
excellent teacher, I highly recommend his class. I learned alot
Recommend taking someone else. He gives four pop quizzes and are only word for word answers from the book. hard! He has no structure. Comes off as mean but he's nice.

His class has no structure and hes and idiot when it comes to anwsering questions.I would not reccomend taking this class. Freshman seminar and he made me write a 9 page paper single spaced. Main reason I left Kennesaw State University

He can't answer questions, the quizzes are hard! He is a nice man, but just doesn't teach well. He needs to learn how to answer questions without sounding mean or condescending. DO THE PROJECTS WELL. Also, if you complete the little things well, you can get an A. He'll exempt you from the final if you get an A before it. Study well for this course.
Awesome teacher, would recommend. Take his constructive criticism because he his only trying to help, laid back and very understanding. He also dresses well.
